title: FS: T206 Cards of the Week (#5) - Suspended
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cards of the Week (#5) - Suspended
posts.post_content:
Please see my final post in this thread for an important update.



444 Cards Remain from the January thread and are still largely available, but I thought trying a new twist might be helpful.

Each week, on Saturday or Sunday, I am going to list 8 random cards with scans and prices.  For 7 days only the posted cards will be available for 10% off the listed price (with no fee payment) with free shipping.  After 7 days the discount and the scans will disappear together and eight more random cards will be posted in this post.

Therefore if you see a scan the ten percent discount is the price you pay.

Feel free to express interest in any other cards on my collector focus tobacco road  collection in the T206 categories and I will give you a price. 

Week 1

Paul Davidson Piedmont 350 PSA 5 - $117 
Ed Greminger (SL) Piedmont 350 PSA 3 - $144 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10356/davidson[/IMG]
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/46377/greminger-sl[/IMG]

Lee Tannehill (No L) Piedmont 350/460 SGC 5 - $126

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/50556/tannehill-no-l[/IMG]

Jack Powell (Horiz) Sweet Cap 150 NY BVG 5 - $135 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10166/powell[/IMG]
Cool idea, Frank! I'll be definitely checking in from week to week. Thanks.

Mr. Speaker has left the building, but will continue the 10% off pricing for another week on the Week 1 cards.  Week 2 cards have been added below.  Thanks for looking.  Remember to check the scans of everything on the collectorfocus website TOBACCO ROAD collection.  

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/frankbmd/t206-psa/50[/url]
[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/frankbmd/t206-sgc[/url]
[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/frankbmd/t206-bvg[/url]

Requests for pricing will be answered for specific cards.  You may see a Cobb in this thread soon.  You never know. 

Week 2
 
Admiral Schlei (Sweater) Polar Bear BVG 5 - $150  ($135 this week only)
Bill Dineen Sweet Cap 350 NY BVG 4.5 - $80  ($72 this week only)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10194/schlei-portrait[/IMG]
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10095/dineen[/IMG]

Hugh Duffy Sovereign 460 SGC 40 - $180 ($162 this week only)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/57160/duffy-sov-hof[/IMG]

Al Mattern Sweet Cap 350 NY SGC 50 - $60 ($54 this week only)
Red Murray Portrait Piedmont 350-460 SGC 55 - $80 ($72 this week only)

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10271/mattern[/IMG]
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/15137/murray-portrait[/IMG]

Tommy Leach Bending Piedmont 350 PSA 5.5 - $200 ($180 this week only) 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10461/leach-bending[/IMG]


__________________
I will take the T206 PSA-4 Seitz SL, PM sent ...  Steve
PM sent on Prince Hal.  Trent King

Prices posted this week are the prices reflecting 10% off and will not revert to a higher price.

This week's offering includes two pink cards, two Old Mill SLers and a guy named "Bugs" (how appropriate).

Fair warning - with 98 cards already sold  this could be the last week of this sellathon.

I urge you to not delay your requests.  Take a look.  If you delay, I will not take responsibility if your registration gets jolted.     



[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/junk/14639/downs-freak[/IMG]

I'm late this week and am only going to post 1 card

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/12293/cobb-bat-off-om[/IMG]

$OLD shipped

trimmed and presentable with an OLD MILL reverse.

100 cards have been sold.  I believe the list in the previous post is accurate.

Several more sales have been completed, so I am closing this sale for the time being.

For those waiting for Cards of the week #6, I apologize.

For those participants purchasing cards, I thank you.  You have reinforced my belief that BST works.

The silent auction for the Bernhard card will remain open.  We still need five more valid bids before a winner is named.
